GLUDELETEQUADRIC(3G) GLUDELETEQUADRIC(3G)

NAME

gluDeleteQuadric - destroy a quadrics object

C SPECIFICATION

void gluDeleteQuadric( GLUquadric* quad )









PARAMETERS



  
quad

  
Specifies the quadrics object to be destroyed.








DESCRIPTION


gluDeleteQuadric destroys the quadrics object (created with
    gluNewQuadric) and frees any memory it uses. Once
    gluDeleteQuadric has been called, quad cannot be used
  again.






SEE
  ALSO


gluNewQuadric
